result.text:
ğŸ©¸The composition of blood:

Blood is made up of two main components:

ğŸŸ¡ Plasma: 55%
ğŸ”´ Formed elements: 45%

Plasma:

Water: 91%
Proteins: 7%*
Other solutes: 2%**

Formed elements:

Red blood cells: 99%***
Platelets & white blood cells: 1%****

*albumins 57%, globulins 38%, fibrinogen 4%, prothrombin 1% (carry out a number of functions, from transporting hormones to clotting blood cells).

**various electrolytes, lipids, ions, amino acids, glucose etc.

***deliver oxygen and nutrients all over the body. 

****platelets form clots to lessen bleeding during wound-healing. White blood cells protect the body from infection.

summary.text:

A more accurate version of this list can be found which ranks countries based on ethnic, linguistic, and religious fractionalization.
